hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn `Abbas:The Prophet (ﷺ) used to say, "I seek refuge (with YOU) by Your 'Izzat, None has the right to be worshipped but You Who does not die while the Jinns and the human beings die

chapter.ara-name: باب قَوْلِ اللَّهِ تَعَالَى {وَهْوَ الْعَزِيزُ الْحَكِيمُ}
chapter.eng-name: “And He is the All-Mighty, the All-Wise.”
